post.body: I appreciate that very much, I'll make my decision in the am when the smoke stops coming out of my ears!
That is a good deal, thinking when wud I ever use it again, not really an online shopper (oooops, twitterers don't hear that.)
Thanks for the link. Lady looks so happy getting HER IN STOCK toys! grrrrr. So $59 after discount right?
Yikes! How do I get on ur good side! LOL!
Prayer said.
Hi! How's ur friend Karen Jo doing. Have her card right here almost ready, struggled for words. Been thinking about her alot
Thanks! I guess I shudn't have dissed her. ooops!
That's what he said prime - I quite obviously have no clue what I'm talking about but it sounded famliar! LOL!
Amen and Amen.With all due respect ur a grown grossly overpaid adult who makes a living pretending to be someone else. Hello?
LOL Top Gun, fun movie. Agreed! LOL!
Awww, how fun! They seem like very genuine people who love God and know the importance of priority.
Thank you , I needed that. Thought I was losing my mind. I realize we need escape but there has 2 be a better way.
Stupid AND crazy. Like this stunt is going to make him come back now. He should run like Forrest if he's smart enuff!
RT hilarious!moms.....check out this blog....what part of the momtourage are you??? http://jijr.com/9Qj
LOL! How bout a bounty paper towel on a pool scimmer! Just a thought!
Awwwwk! I tried that last night and FORGOT how much bad language & bad attitude were in there, it was shut OFF!.
LOL Right? I was projecting our gluttony. Nice try huh!
It wud be nice if I could keep up with any of it! LOL! upside is I'm not carrying a cel phone in a carryon bag. So that's gud!
ROFL - that is EXACTLY right, a wife!
OMGSH! don't even say that. Be careful going out to ur car, people are falling all over the place. G'day!
and same to you, with love and respect in Christ.
So many are easily charmed & blinded.The niblets he throws are made to distract. Disturbing & Michelle, don't get me started.
Agreed, our sides are mutual.So important for fair weather followers to c the discrepancies he displays. In love of course.
Never too early for WII, I guess not. Nothing like someone bowling over ur head while trying to Tweet!
Day two - never too early for WII sports!! (got it!) LOL
Scientists find 2000 yo brain?This has GOT to be a woman sticking around long enuff to prove a point! LOL!http://tinyurl.com/5dlfpx
Build a personal brand w/social media content franchises- great post! http://tinyurl.com/6anas2
TwittyPic? I get it, but I mean I don't get it!http://tinyurl.com/5zbgp4
Top Chef's Tom Colicchio sued for stiffing his workers- Aw man!I like him-Tom! It's not like u don't have the $ !!http://tinyurl.com/6lq6f5
I read this yesterday, can't get over it -50 "bil" $$ fraud, I heard his kids turned him in - bernard Madoff http://tinyurl.com/6mhbrs
U think this is weak minds,cop out for bad behavior & self pity? Mental health disorders common in young adults?http://tinyurl.com/6ejmxz
Nude Virgin Mary ? Talk about no class and tasteless, they shud apologize! Disgraceful!http://tinyurl.com/658v3q
News article read guy loses 235 lbs in 7 mos. cudn't help but wonder if he got a divorce ! LOL I'm kidding! Sheesh!
Need to find myself some dinner, it's only 11:22 - aawwwwk! 11:22!
Speaking of humble didn't my guy Tim Tebow win an award, Maxwell award or something? Heisman trophy's coming up YAY!
I'm all about a celeb for a good cause-use your money for gud but don't use your gud money for accolades! I hate that! Humble bumble.
Have a good night everyone. I'm out.
height predictor, how tall will ur child be?http://tinyurl.com/64kgb6
HSN shoes, if there weren't 3 " of snow outside, I wud buy these 4 Sure.
OMGSH Super cute shoes on HSN right now. Not very snow friendly & a little embellished but VERY cute.
Cartoon Network and Nick needs to use animated characters to promote fruits, veggies and H2O! LOL
Buckle up kids , it's a whole new slew of primetime reality. Rediscovered, Mama's Boy and some hero show.Last one cud b a tear jerker!
God Bless our troops and THANK YOU to u & ur families, I appreciate ur service & protection.Watching Kimmel, troops have great disposition.
I KNEW I saw this !!! College game in 3D http://tinyurl.com/5aqf7w
Can someone explain to me , how and why Tom Cruise is relevant in comparison to other current events. Aside from a movie premiere?
Does anyone save Box Tops for Education? Did u know they have an expiration date? I sure didn't !!
This Il Gov Blagosaga is like a Ginsu infomercial. Just when u tought u had the whole set, WAIT....there's more! Uggh!
Thank you HSN for having Mario Kart in stock! Phew!
So I think it's super great that the feds are lowering the rates, but what 2 do if you don't have a job. You Can't refinance. Anybody?
Lawyers use facebook to serve legal papers! Watch out kids! http://tinyurl.com/5l3ouc
Oprah's hidden camera show how people react in other's criis situation. Wud you ignore a woman being abused,or a person about 2 drive drunk?
Watching Oprah!
Animal Refuge bursting w/abandon animals. sad http://tinyurl.com/6ywzu8
My oldest made a ton of pizelles for xmas, not a single crumb left. Bak-asaurus!
Next generation cell phones will WOW you in 2009 http://twurl.nl/y6v00c
Adios Twitmigos! Make it a super great day!
Time to change locations, we're in a WII boxing frenzy. Evidentally my 5yo ALSO has severe pent up agression. Be back later! Sheesh!
Oh my! We went from WII bowling to golf, to boxing. WAIT! Lemme see that thing, I have some pent up aggression!
Wachovia settlement checks are real! http://twurl.nl/8c04so
It is way to early for Wii Sports but...I've been out numbered. Christmas joy continues....
